attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wyndley house volunteers, need the support of your office.
This group of communitie volunteers, run and project in Newcastle upon Tyne, offering support the 144 flats. They run a lunch club, a transport to the shops, and medical support, they offer books and films at the door service. There arts and craft group has won national awards. The project has been use as a template, to show and help other groups setting up there own volunteer projects. Mps and ministers have visited the project, and given there support. 
But now funding is to be removed, from this volunteer project. 
The state will now have the task of looking after older people within the flats. 
Home help and visitors will have to be found by the state. A some may have to be taken into state care.
This volunteer group has shown great communitie spirit; over many years  but need state funding to carry on! This is a unpaid 7 day a week service, which now needs public funding.
It makes no sense not to support this project.
